Activity: Arrive at the office, check emails. Review recent findings on seasonal influenza outbreaks and their impact on local communities.
Receive the testing report from @qatest-1 and evaluate the reported issues. @PEOPLE: qatest-1 Topic: Test Report Evaluation.
Prioritize the bug fixes based on their severity and impact on the report's functionality and accuracy. Focus on addressing critical issues first.
Implement the necessary bug fixes in the report template. Thoroughly test each fix to ensure it resolves the issue without introducing new problems.
Update the documentation to reflect the bug fixes and any changes made to the report's functionality. Ensure the documentation is clear and up-to-date.
Conduct a final round of testing to verify that all identified issues have been resolved and that the report is functioning as expected.
Prepare the report template for deployment. Package all necessary files and documentation into a single archive for easy distribution.
Draft a deployment guide that outlines the steps for installing and configuring the report template. Include detailed instructions and troubleshooting tips.
Backup all the files and prepare to leave office.
